name: Rohan Patel
label: Engineer & Researcher
summary: I am a Purdue engineer interested in dynamical systems, numerical methods, and scientific machine learning (SciML).

work_experience.company: Purdue University School of Mechanical Engineering and Department of Food Science
highlights: Simulated fluid dynamics of microdroplets for use in 3D printing
Used Finite Elements and Physics-Informed Neural Networks to solve differential equations with mixed boundary conditions
Experimented with biased Neural Autoencoders to statistically test food rheology data
Taught classes on middle and high school math
Graded SAT practice tests
Developed an automated system with Excel, WhatsApp, and Python to score tests and send score reports for 100+ customers

projects.title: 3D Printed Roller Coaster
highlights: Led over 45 members in designing and manufacturing a 1:30 scale roller coaster
Developed a full kinematic simulation and ODE solver in Python with NumPy, Matplotlib, Scipy, logging, etc.
Optimized track segmentation and structural support placement to minimize print time and beam deflection
Created SolidWorks macros (VBA) for members to model track
Presented Roller Coaster Track and Support Structure: Dynamics, Simulation, and Optimization at Undergraduate Research Conference
23-24 Manufacturing Documentation Video

projects.title: Robotics Wiki Lead
projects.summary: I organize, write, and maintain this open-source robotics documentation project.
highlights: Largest open source knowledge base for competitive robotics
Over 40K monthly pageviews
Some of my most educational articles are on flywheels, four-bars, and center of mass.
My Commits

projects.title: High Energy Physics Research
highlights: Trained neural network (PyTorch) to separate Standard Model and Supersymmetric Data
Presented at Spring Undergraduate Research Symposium

projects.title: Piano Hand Simulation
highlights: Translated CAD to URDF
Programmed PID controller with multithreading to simulate robotic hand in a virtual environment

images.caption: Robotic Hand Playing "Hot Cross Buns" in ROS2-controlled Gazebo simulator

projects.title: Bokeh Image Filter
projects.summary: Created a post-processing image filter (using PIL and ffmpeg) that animates an image using progressively smaller bokeh circles to unveil the final picture

projects.title: Purdue Solar Racing Data Analysis
highlights: Analyzed data from the American Solar Challenge to simulate car and optimize physical parameters
Combined sensor data from CAN bus, motor encoders, GPS, weather, and solar panels with pandas, SciPy, SymPy, and Matplotlib
